content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (-16.0, -49.0) with a burner inserter at position (-17.5, -48.5) feeding it.
- Furnace at position (-14.0, -49.0) with a burner inserter at position (-13.5, -47.5) feeding it.
- Transport belts connecting these furnaces to other parts of the facility.

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (-13.5, -46.5) with a burner inserter at position (-13.5, -45.5) feeding it.
- Transport belts connecting the chest to other parts of the facility.

### Electricity Generator at Position (-7.0, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 23.5)
- Steam engine at position (-3.5, 23.5)
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Connected pipes and electricity poles forming a network for power distribution.

### Belt Systems
- BeltGroup 1: Inputs at position (-11.5, -46.5) to outputs at position (-8.5, -43.5), transporting iron plates.
- BeltGroup 2: Inputs at position (-12.5, -44.5) to outputs at position (-11.5, -46.5), currently empty.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extraction but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when extracting items from non-existent or empty entities
- Verify that the entity you are attempting to extract from exists and contains the required items before extraction.

### Errors when attempting to insert items without having them in inventory
- Check your inventory to ensure you have the items you are trying to insert into another entity.
